name: Post Chronos
description:
Info

Post Chronos is a puzzle game set at the end of time; Make your path, find the door, and keep moving! The game takes inspiration from old-school Zelda dungeons but in Post Chronos, you move the rooms to make your way forward.  Pay attention to the islands around you, the bridges they can create are the key to reaching the door.

If you enjoyed the game (or not) consider leaving a comment, I would love to hear your feedback so I can continue crafting the best possible experience. 

Controls

Arrow Keys and WASD:                Movement

E :                                                                Interact with magic pedestal

Left Click:                                               Select islands to move.
